price: អល់ឡោះនឹងលុបបំបាត់និងរក្សាទុកនូវអ្វីដែលទ្រង់មាន ចេតនា ហើយអ៊ំមុលគីតាប(ឡាវហុលម៉ះហ្វ៊ូស)នោះមាននៅជា មួយទ្រង់។
arabic: يَمۡحُواْ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيُثۡبِتُۖ وَعِندَهُۥٓ أُمُّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yamḥū al-lahu mā yashāu wayuth'bitu waʿindahu ummu al-kitābi
